data.name: CallerAllocConstructorMustHaveBufferSizeDescription
data.value: When a constructor taking a 'Span<byte>' is specified on the native type, the type must set the BufferSize field on the 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute' to provide the size of the caller-allocated buffer.

data.name: CallerAllocConstructorMustHaveBufferSizeMessage
data.value: The native type '{0}' must set the 'BufferSize' field on the applied 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute' to specify the size of the caller-allocated buffer because it has a constructor that takes a caller-allocated 'Span<byte>'

data.name: CallerAllocMarshallingShouldSupportAllocatingMarshallingFallbackDescription
data.value: A type that supports marshalling from managed to native using a caller-allocated buffer should also support marshalling from managed to native where using a caller-allocated buffer is impossible.

data.name: CallerAllocMarshallingShouldSupportAllocatingMarshallingFallbackMessage
data.value: Native type '{0}' has a constructor taking a caller-allocated buffer, but does not support marshalling in scenarios where using a caller-allocated buffer is impossible

data.name: CannotForwardToDllImportDescription
data.value: The generated 'DllImportAttribute' will not have a value corresponding to '{0}'.

data.name: CannotForwardToDllImportMessage
data.value: '{0}' has no equivalent in 'DllImportAtttribute' and will not be forwarded

data.name: CannotForwardToDllImportTitle
data.value: Specified 'LibraryImportAttribute' arguments cannot be forwarded to 'DllImportAttribute'

data.name: ConfigurationNotSupportedDescription
data.value: Source-generated P/Invokes will ignore any configuration that is not supported.

data.name: ConfigurationNotSupportedMessage
data.value: The '{0}' configuration is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes. If the specified configuration is required, use a regular `DllImport` instead.

data.name: ConfigurationNotSupportedMessageMarshallingInfo
data.value: The specified marshalling configuration is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes. {0}.

data.name: ConfigurationNotSupportedMessageParameter
data.value: The specified '{0}' configuration for parameter '{1}' is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes. If the specified configuration is required, use a regular `DllImport` instead.

data.name: ConfigurationNotSupportedMessageReturn
data.value: The specified '{0}' configuration for the return value of method '{1}' is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes. If the specified configuration is required, use a regular `DllImport` instead.

data.name: ConfigurationNotSupportedMessageValue
data.value: The specified value '{0}' for '{1}' is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes. If the specified configuration is required, use a regular `DllImport` instead.

data.name: ConfigurationNotSupportedTitle
data.value: Specified configuration is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes.

data.name: ConstantAndElementCountInfoDisallowed
data.value: Only one of 'ConstantElementCount' or 'ElementCountInfo' may be used in a 'MarshalUsingAttribute' for a given 'ElementIndirectionDepth'

data.name: ConvertNoPreserveSigDllImportToGeneratedMayProduceInvalidCode
data.value: Automatically converting a P/Invoke with 'PreserveSig' set to 'false' to a source-generated P/Invoke may produce invalid code

data.name: ConvertToLibraryImport
data.value: Convert to 'LibraryImport'

data.name: ConvertToLibraryImportDescription
data.value: Use 'LibraryImportAttribute' instead of 'DllImportAttribute' to generate P/Invoke marshalling code at compile time

data.name: ConvertToLibraryImportMessage
data.value: Mark the method '{0}' with 'LibraryImportAttribute' instead of 'DllImportAttribute' to generate P/Invoke marshalling code at compile time

data.name: ConvertToLibraryImportTitle
data.value: Use 'LibraryImportAttribute' instead of 'DllImportAttribute' to generate P/Invoke marshalling code at compile time

data.name: ConvertToLibraryImportWarning
data.value: Conversion to 'LibraryImport' may change behavior and compatibility. See {0} for more information.

data.name: ConvertToLibraryImportWithSuffix
data.value: Convert to 'LibraryImport' with '{0}' suffix

data.name: CustomTypeMarshallingManagedToNativeUnsupported
data.value: The specified parameter needs to be marshalled from managed to native, but the native type '{0}' does not support it.

data.name: CustomTypeMarshallingNativeToManagedUnsupported
data.value: The specified parameter needs to be marshalled from native to managed, but the native type '{0}' does not support it.

data.name: GetPinnableReferenceReturnTypeBlittableDescription
data.value: The return type of 'GetPinnableReference' (after accounting for 'ref') must be blittable.

data.name: GetPinnableReferenceReturnTypeBlittableMessage
data.value: The dereferenced type of the return type of the 'GetPinnableReference' method must be blittable

data.name: GetPinnableReferenceShouldSupportAllocatingMarshallingFallbackDescription
data.value: A type that supports marshalling from managed to native by pinning should also support marshalling from managed to native where pinning is impossible.

data.name: GetPinnableReferenceShouldSupportAllocatingMarshallingFallbackMessage
data.value: Type '{0}' has a 'GetPinnableReference' method but its native type does not support marshalling in scenarios where pinning is impossible

data.name: InvalidAttributedMethodContainingTypeMissingModifiersMessage
data.value: Method '{0}' is contained in a type '{1}' that is not marked 'partial'. P/Invoke source generation will ignore method '{0}'.

data.name: InvalidAttributedMethodDescription
data.value: Methods marked with 'LibraryImportAttribute' should be 'static', 'partial', and non-generic. P/Invoke source generation will ignore methods that are non-'static', non-'partial', or generic.

data.name: InvalidAttributedMethodSignatureMessage
data.value: Method '{0}' should be 'static', 'partial', and non-generic when marked with 'LibraryImportAttribute'. P/Invoke source generation will ignore method '{0}'.

data.name: InvalidLibraryImportAttributeUsageTitle
data.value: Invalid 'LibraryImportAttribute' usage

data.name: InvalidStringMarshallingConfigurationDescription
data.value: The configuration of 'StringMarshalling' and 'StringMarshallingCustomType' is invalid.

data.name: InvalidStringMarshallingConfigurationMessage
data.value: The configuration of 'StringMarshalling' and 'StringMarshallingCustomType' on method '{0}' is invalid. {1}
data.comment: {1} is a message containing additional details about what is not valid

data.name: InvalidStringMarshallingConfigurationMissingCustomType
data.value: 'StringMarshallingCustomType' must be specified when 'StringMarshalling' is set to 'StringMarshalling.Custom'.

data.name: InvalidStringMarshallingConfigurationNotCustom
data.value: 'StringMarshalling' should be set to 'StringMarshalling.Custom' when 'StringMarshallingCustomType' is specified.

data.name: MarshallerGetPinnableReferenceRequiresTwoStageMarshallingDescription
data.value: The use cases for 'GetPinnableReference' are not applicable in any scenarios where 'TwoStageMarshalling' is not also required.

data.name: MarshallerGetPinnableReferenceRequiresTwoStageMarshallingMessage
data.value: The 'GetPinnableReference' method cannot be provided on the native type '{0}' unless the 'TwoStageMarshalling' feature is also supported

data.name: MarshallerKindMustBeValidDescription
data.value: The specified marshaller kind must be a valid value of the 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomMarshallerKind' enum.

data.name: MarshallerKindMustBeValidMessage
data.value: The specified custom marshaller kind for '{0}' is invalid

data.name: MarshallerTypeMustSpecifyManagedTypeDescription
data.value: A type with a 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute' must specify a managed type

data.name: MarshallerTypeMustSpecifyManagedTypeMessage
data.value: The type '{0}' does not specify a managed type in the 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute' applied to the type

data.name: NativeGenericTypeMustBeClosedOrMatchArityDescription
data.value: The native type '{0}' must be a closed generic or have the same number of generic parameters as the managed type so the emitted code can use a specific instantiation.

data.name: NativeGenericTypeMustBeClosedOrMatchArityMessage
data.value: The native type '{0}' for managed type '{1}' must be a closed generic type or have the same arity as the managed type.

data.name: NativeTypeMustBeBlittableDescription
data.value: A native type must be blittable.

data.name: NativeTypeMustBeBlittableMessage
data.value: The native type '{0}' for type '{1}' must be blittable

data.name: NativeTypeMustBePointerSizedDescription
data.value: The native type must be pointer sized so the pinned result of 'GetPinnableReference' can be cast to the native type.

data.name: NativeTypeMustBePointerSizedMessage
data.value: The native type '{0}' must be pointer sized because the managed type '{1}' has a 'GetPinnableReference' method

data.name: NativeTypeMustHaveCustomTypeMarshallerAttributeDescription
data.value: A native type for a given type must have the 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute' that specifies this type as the managed type.

data.name: NativeTypeMustHaveCustomTypeMarshallerAttributeMessage
data.value: The native type for the type '{0}' must be a type with the 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute' that specifies this type as the managed type

data.name: CustomMarshallerTypeMustSupportDirectionDescription
data.value: A native must set the 'Direction' property on the 'CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute' to a value that sets at least one known flag value on the 'CustomTypeMarshallerDirection' enum

data.name: CustomMarshallerTypeMustSupportDirectionMessage
data.value: The native type '{0}' must set the 'Direction' property on the 'CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute' to a value that sets at least one known flag value on the 'CustomTypeMarshallerDirection' enum

data.name: RefNativeValueUnsupportedDescription
data.value: The 'Value' property must not be a 'ref' or 'readonly ref' property.

data.name: RefNativeValueUnsupportedMessage
data.value: The 'Value' property on the native type '{0}' must not be a 'ref' or 'readonly ref' property.

data.name: SafeHandleByRefMustBeConcrete
data.value: An abstract type derived from 'SafeHandle' cannot be marshalled by reference. The provided type must be concrete.

data.name: TargetFrameworkNotSupportedDescription
data.value: P/Invoke source generation is not supported on unknown target framework v{0}. The generated source will not be compatible with other frameworks.

data.name: TargetFrameworkNotSupportedMessage
data.value: 'LibraryImportAttribute' cannot be used for source-generated P/Invokes on an unknown target framework v{0}.

data.name: TargetFrameworkNotSupportedTitle
data.value: Current target framework is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes

data.name: TypeNotSupportedDescription
data.value: For types that are not supported by source-generated P/Invokes, the resulting P/Invoke will rely on the underlying runtime to marshal the specified type.

data.name: TypeNotSupportedMessageParameter
data.value: The type '{0}' is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes. The generated source will not handle marshalling of parameter '{1}'.

data.name: TypeNotSupportedMessageParameterWithDetails
data.value: {0} The generated source will not handle marshalling of parameter '{1}'.
data.comment: {0} is a message containing additional details about what is not supported {1} is the name of the parameter

data.name: TypeNotSupportedMessageReturn
data.value: The type '{0}' is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes. The generated source will not handle marshalling of the return value of method '{1}'.

data.name: TypeNotSupportedMessageReturnWithDetails
data.value: {0} The generated source will not handle marshalling of the return value of method '{1}'.
data.comment: {0} is a message containing additional details about what is not supported {1} is the name of the method

data.name: TypeNotSupportedTitle
data.value: Specified type is not supported by source-generated P/Invokes

data.name: InTwoStageMarshallingRequiresToNativeValueDescription
data.value: The 'TwoStageMarshalling' feature requires a 'TNativeType ToNativeValue()' method for the 'In' direction.

data.name: InTwoStageMarshallingRequiresToNativeValueMessage
data.value: The marshaller type '{0}' supports marshalling in the 'In' direction with the 'TwoStageMarshalling' feature must provide a 'ToNativeValue' instance method that returns the native value

data.name: OutTwoStageMarshallingRequiresFromNativeValueDescription
data.value: The 'TwoStageMarshalling' feature requires a 'void FromNativeValue(TNativeType value)' method for the 'Out' direction.

data.name: OutTwoStageMarshallingRequiresFromNativeValueMessage
data.value: The marshaller type '{0}' supports marshalling in the 'Out' direction with the 'TwoStageMarshalling' feature, but it does not provide a 'FromNativeValue' instance method that returns 'void' and takes one parameter.

data.name: CustomTypeMarshallerAttributeMustBeValidDescription
data.value: The 'CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute' attribute must be semantically valid

data.name: CustomTypeMarshallerAttributeMustBeValidMessage
data.value: The 'CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute' on '{0}' is semantically invalid

data.name: LinearCollectionInCallerAllocatedBufferRequiresSpanConstructorDescription
data.value: A 'LinearCollection'-kind native type that supports the 'CallerAllocatedBuffer' feature must provide a three-parameter constructor taking the managed type as the first parameter, a 'Span<byte>' as the second parameter, and the native size of the element as the third parameter

data.name: LinearCollectionInCallerAllocatedBufferRequiresSpanConstructorMessage
data.value: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports 'In' marshalling with the 'CallerAllocatedBuffer' feature for '{1}' but does not provide a three-parameter constructor that takes a '{1}' , a 'Span<byte>', and an 'int'

data.name: LinearCollectionInRequiresTwoParameterConstructorDescription
data.value: A 'LinearCollection'-kind native type must provide a two-parameter constructor taking the managed type as the first parameter and the native size of the element as the second parameter

data.name: LinearCollectionInRequiresTwoParameterConstructorMessage
data.value: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports 'In' marshalling of '{1}' but does not provide a two-parameter constructor that takes a '{1}' as the first parameter and an 'int' as the second parameter

data.name: MarshallerDirectionMustBeValidDescription
data.value: The specified marshaller direction must be a valid value of the 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomMarshallerDirection' enum.

data.name: MarshallerDirectionMustBeValidMessage
data.value: The specified custom marshaller direction for '{0}' is invalid

data.name: ValueInCallerAllocatedBufferRequiresSpanConstructorDescription
data.value: A 'Value'-kind native type that supports the 'CallerAllocatedBuffer' feature must provide a two-parameter constructor taking the managed type and a 'Span' of an 'unmanaged' type as parameters

data.name: ValueInCallerAllocatedBufferRequiresSpanConstructorMessage
data.value: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports 'In' marshalling with the 'CallerAllocatedBuffer' feature for '{1}' but does not provide a one-parameter constructor that takes a '{1}' and 'Span' of an 'unmanaged' type as parameters

data.name: ValueInRequiresOneParameterConstructorDescription
data.value: A 'Value'-kind native type must provide a one-parameter constructor taking the managed type as a parameter

data.name: ValueInRequiresOneParameterConstructorMessage
data.value: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports 'In' marshalling of '{1}' but does not provide a one-parameter constructor that takes a '{1}' as a parameter

data.name: LinearCollectionInRequiresCollectionMethodsDescription
data.value: A 'LinearCollection'-kind native type that supports marshalling in the 'In' direction must provide a 'GetManagedValuesSource' that returns a 'ReadOnlySpan<>' and a 'GetNativeValuesDestination' method that returns a 'Span<byte>'.

data.name: LinearCollectionInRequiresCollectionMethodsMessage
data.value: The type '{0}' specifies that is supports marshalling in the 'In' direction, but it does not provide a 'GetManagedValuesSource' that returns a 'ReadOnlySpan<>' and a 'GetNativeValuesDestination' method that returns a 'Span<byte>'

data.name: OutRequiresToManagedDescription
data.value: A 'Value' or 'LinearCollection'-kind native type that supports marshalling in the 'Out' direction must provide a 'ToManaged' method that returns the managed type.

data.name: OutRequiresToManagedMessage
data.value: The type '{0}' specifies it supports marshalling in the 'Out' direction, but it does not provide a 'ToManaged' method that returns the managed type

data.name: LinearCollectionOutRequiresCollectionMethodsDescription
data.value: A 'LinearCollection'-kind native type that supports marshalling in the 'Out' direction must provide a 'GetManagedValuesDestination' that takes an 'int' and returns a 'Span<>' and a 'GetNativeValuesSource' method that takes an 'int' and rreturns a 'ReadOnlySpan<byte>'.

data.name: LinearCollectionOutRequiresCollectionMethodsMessage
data.value: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports marshalling in the 'Out' direction, but it does not provide a 'GetManagedValuesDestination' that takes an 'int' and returns a 'Span<>' and a 'GetNativeValuesSource' method that takes an 'int' and rreturns a 'ReadOnlySpan<byte>'

data.name: LinearCollectionOutRequiresIntConstructorDescription
data.value: A 'LinearCollection'-kind native type that supports marshalling in the 'Out' direction must provide a constructor that takes the size of the native element as an 'int'.

data.name: LinearCollectionOutRequiresIntConstructorMessage
data.value: The type '{0}' specifies that it supports marshalling in the 'Out' direction, but it does not provide a constructor that takes the size of the native element as an 'int'.

data.name: UnmanagedResourcesRequiresFreeNativeDescription
data.value: The 'UnmanagedResources' feature requires a 'void FreeNative()' method.

data.name: UnmanagedResourcesRequiresFreeNativeMessage
data.value: The marshaller type '{0}' supports marshalling with the 'UnmanagedResources' feature, but it does not provide a parameterless 'FreeNative' instance method that returns 'void'

data.name: AddMissingCustomTypeMarshallerMembers
data.value: Add missing custom type marshaller members

data.name: AddMissingFeaturesToCustomTypeMarshaller
data.value: Add missing features to the 'CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute' attribute

data.name: CallerAllocatedBufferConstructorProvidedShouldSpecifyFeatureDescription
data.value: A marshaller type that provides a constructor taking a caller-allocated 'Span<byte>' should specify that it supports the 'CallerAllocatedBuffer' feature.

data.name: CallerAllocatedBufferConstructorProvidedShouldSpecifyFeatureMessage
data.value: The type '{0}' provides a constructor taking a caller-allocated 'Span<byte>' but does not specify that it supports the 'CallerAllocatedBuffer' feature. The constructor will not be used unless the feature is specified.

data.name: FreeNativeMethodProvidedShouldSpecifyUnmanagedResourcesFeatureDescription
data.value: A marshaller type that provides a 'FreeNative' method should specify that it supports the 'UnmanagedResources' feature.

data.name: FreeNativeMethodProvidedShouldSpecifyUnmanagedResourcesFeatureMessage
data.value: The type '{0}' provides a 'FreeNative' method but does not specify that it supports the 'UnmanagedResources' feature. The method will not be used unless the feature is specified.

data.name: FromNativeValueMethodProvidedShouldSpecifyTwoStageMarshallingFeatureDescription
data.value: A marshaller type that provides a 'FromNativeValue' method should specify that it supports the 'TwoStageMarshalling' feature.

data.name: FromNativeValueMethodProvidedShouldSpecifyTwoStageMarshallingFeatureMessage
data.value: The type '{0}' provides a 'FromNativeValue' method but does not specify that it supports the 'TwoStageMarshalling' feature. The method will not be used unless the feature is specified.

data.name: LinearCollectionElementTypesMustMatchDescription
data.value: The element type of the 'ReadOnlySpan' returned by 'GetManagedValuesSource' must be the same as the element type returned by 'GetManagedValuesDestination'.

data.name: LinearCollectionElementTypesMustMatchMessage
data.value: The element type of the 'ReadOnlySpan' returned by 'GetManagedValuesSource' must be the same as the element type returned by 'GetManagedValuesDestination'

data.name: ToNativeValueMethodProvidedShouldSpecifyTwoStageMarshallingFeatureDescription
data.value: A marshaller type that provides a 'ToNativeValue' method should specify that it supports the 'TwoStageMarshalling' feature.

data.name: ToNativeValueMethodProvidedShouldSpecifyTwoStageMarshallingFeatureMessage
data.value: The type '{0}' provides a 'ToNativeValue' method but does not specify that it supports the 'TwoStageMarshalling' feature. The method will not be used unless the feature is specified.

data.name: TwoStageMarshallingNativeTypesMustMatchDescription
data.value: The return type of 'ToNativeValue' and the parameter type of 'FromNativeValue' must be the same.

data.name: TwoStageMarshallingNativeTypesMustMatchMessage
data.value: The return type of 'ToNativeValue' and the parameter type of 'FromNativeValue' must be the same
